data.name: Vroid Vtuber Broadcast Tool Mac supported
data.detailed_description:
Metaverse will become our second life in the future. This broadcast software will contribute as one of the components in the metaverse.
We also have other music video maker software for Vroid called DAN☆SING!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1688750/DANSING_for_Vroid_and_MMD_Dan_Sing_Sing/

The features are summarized below
  • Create and upload your virtual character into the app
  • Control the character with only a webcam
  • Lip-sync with what you say
  • Media composition such as video/image insert
  • 1080P Video Export
  • Different poses and emotion supported
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: Be what you want to be. You would import your own virtual avatar and make your own show.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4460 or better
  • Graphics: VIDIA GeForce GTX 970 or better
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: indows 10 64bit
  • Processor: ntel Core i5-8400/AMD Ryzen 5 2600X or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: VIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or better
